text:
Anyway to make IntelliSense work better with the vs code extension?

Emmet works for somethings, but as you can see it doesnt autocomplete `class=""`  or the class name. Like it does in HTML files.

Also formatting would be dope

I'd really like to use the extension, but I just cant.

There is too many little things that don't work very good :cry:

Anyone know if it's possible to create a "section" with more than one row? The boilerplate has an example of a pricing section that has a heading above three cards but I am unable to add it to my page.
Sure is - are you trying to code it or make it in the page editor?

I'm coding it. I solved my issue though - found the answer in the a documentation page that I had previously missed.

I appreciate your offer to help.
